name: Legendary Bushido Samurai Saga
description:
Join the real samurai’s era playing our new Legendary Bushido Samurai Saga fighting game – just choose the hero to play for and rush into the battlefield! Contest with the greatest fighters of this period and prove that you can protect the bushido codex! Train your skills fighting with absolutely different samurai heroes and become the mightiest warrior ever!

Step into fantastic battle locations, authentic to the samurai’s epoch! Warm your body up and be ready to defeat everybody on your way for the sake of your samurai’s clan! Remember, that you should follow your health level – don’t let it fall too much if you want to become the best; otherwise, your game will be over!

Earn points for each successfully defeated samurai warrior and unlock more professional bushido fighters to play for – they all have some other stats, skills, weapons and even characteristics! Learn more about their combos and super strikes and you’ll be able to power your every hero up soon! Check this awesome Legendary Bushido Samurai Saga game – you’ll be happy with it!

Try four fascinating game modes to vary the gameplay! Learn more about your samurai hero’s stats, weapons, and blows in the training mode. Pave your way through your defeated rivals in the ladder mode. Join simple single mode to defeat one rival up to three times. Try to do your best in the survival mode and stand against the large waves of crafty rivals!

Legendary Bushido Samurai Saga features:
• Bushido samurais fighting game
• Four amazing game modes
• Many different warriors to play for
• Lots of stunning rivals to fight with
• Chance to upgrade your hero
• Interesting skills and weapons
• Authentic 3D battle locations

Check our new amazing Legendary Bushido Samurai Saga game and feel like a real samurai fighting for his clan!
